meanings.definition: The wooden planks forming the deck of a ship.
meanings.sent1: The sailors walked carefully on the shipboards to avoid slipping.
meanings.sent2: The salty sea air filled the lungs of the crew standing on the shipboards.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous seagull landed on the shipboards and stole a fish from the deck.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight danced on the shipboards, creating a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent5: The sound of waves crashing against the shipboards was soothing to the weary travelers.
